rules_text:
Flying
When Scion of Torrents enters, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Whenever an Island you control enters, you may aetherize Scion of Torrents. [i](To aetherize, create a token that's a copy of it, then exile that token.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]All it ever wanted was the world.[/i]
